word: Truths We Hold Essential Needed for Review.-- Special efforts are being made in the trial volume of the Review [A SERIES OF MISSIONARY ISSUES OF THE REVIEW IN WHICH APPEARED ARTICLES PROVIDING INSTRUCTION IN THE FAITH OF SDAS.] to present our faith in a condensed form before its readers. Every number of the paper going to so many people should correctly represent our faith. Articles are needed that will place before the readers a comprehensive view of our position. The different points of faith are to be clearly defined.
